lead_paragraph: Judge Scheindlin handled major First Amendment cases in her long tenure on Federal District Court and found in a controversial ruling that the New York police had engaged in racial profiling.

headline.print_headline: Federal Judge Behind Stop-and-Frisk Ruling Is Stepping Down Next Month
headline.main: Shira Scheindlin, Judge Behind Stop-and-Frisk Ruling, Will Step Down

snippet: Judge Scheindlin handled major First Amendment cases in her long tenure on Federal District Court and found in a controversial ruling that the New York police had engaged in racial profiling.
abstract: Federal Judge Shira A Scheindlin announces she will step down from bench at end of April; Scheindlin presided over number of major trials during tenure on Federal District Court in Manhattan that lasted more than two decades and played critical role in stop-and-frisk ruling compelling New York City Police Dept to end practice.
